activity.text: Added capability pipeline doc to standardize build->test->proof->document->operationalize flow.
Added/activated immediate workflow hardening layer: `TODAY_STATUS.md` refresh cadence + `Critical update failover guard` checks + dedupe ledger `status/failover-sent.json`.
Dashboard contract now standardized to: running now, next 3 meaningful blocks, last proof, blockers, next action.

Immediate failover audit caught historical 7:00 usage-report failure root cause (disallowed model on that run); retry path is now stabilized on `gpt-5.3-codex` with noon success and next critical retry at 17:00.
Sean explicitly wants high-quality, modular, well-commented, well-documented dashboard code using industry best practices.
Documentation must be updated whenever code changes.
Prioritize strong AGENTS.md engineering contract and maintainable repo structure as the dashboard grows.
Implemented gist-backed status publishing so routine dashboard refreshes do not require repo commits.
Added `scripts/publish_status_gist.py` and `scripts/publish_status.sh`.
Dashboard now resolves runtime source from `data/source.json` (gist URL) with fallback to local status JSON.
Operational split is now explicit:
status refreshes -> gist publish (no commit spam)
code/docs changes -> commit + push path
Sean asked for dashboard freshness during active work; expectation set to keep it continuously current.
Increased `Control room status publish (gist backend)` cadence from every 20 minutes to every 5 minutes (07:00-22:00 America/Chicago).
Refactored `claw-control-room` from vanilla static JS/CSS into modular React + TypeScript (Vite).
New architecture includes:
`src/components`, `src/hooks`, `src/lib`, `src/types`
typed status fetch layer + polling hook
upgraded UI cards/timeline/jobs/findings layout
Added npm toolchain and dependencies for maintainable UI expansion and easier future agent collaboration.
Updated quality gates to include Python checks + TypeScript typecheck + Vite production build.
Updated docs/contracts/changelog to reflect new architecture and workflow (`handbook/*`, `AGENTS.md`, `README.md`, `CHANGELOG.md`).
GitHub Pages updated to serve built app from `main:/docs`; deployment verified built successfully.
